page.title: 14On Saturdays (2) by Alan
page.content:
We play football all over the County. My team has been in the finals twice. We won once and lost once. When I arrive back at home I have a bath and then have my tea. I watch the football results on the television and then go out to play football again. We have a good game of football or rugby and sometimes hide and seek. If it is hot we go up to the beck (stream) and paddle. When I come in I have a cool drink and sometimes an ice-pop out of the refrigerator. I settle down to watch "Match of the Day" on the television. Then I get washed and go to bed. That's what I do on a Saturday.
Alan Scott, aged ten years.
